page.title: 17SHOP SURVEY 2
page.content: SHOP SURVEY 2 Massey newsagents used to be the St Asaph printers in the 18th century. The video shop which is ajoined to Massey newsagents has just been built. N+S Bevins, another newsagents have never had their structure changed either.Barrows Crafts has been open for 3 years but it used to be a greengrocers before then.Llanelwy Bakers used to be a Greengrocers too. Lastly,Ruths Farm Shop has always sold the same goods. i.e. cheese,bread and cold meat. A majority of the shops gained from the tourist trade but a few depend upon local trade and have complained a lack of tourist trade during the last few years. 90% of the owners would prefer to stay stable whereas others would like to gain more profits to expand.
